channel.title: User Guide on DragonFly Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in User Guide on DragonFly Documentation

item.title: Installing Server
item.description: This topic explains how to install the Dragonfly server.

item.title: Installing Client
item.description: You have two options when installing the Dragonfly client: installing from the latest package, or installing from the source code.

item.title: Downloading Files
item.description: Things are done differently when you download container images and download general files with Dragonfly.

item.title: Supernode Configuration
item.description: The supernode is written in Java based on Spring Boot. You can easily set properties with command line parameters or with the configuration file.
